TEXT.TITLE: USP REAL ESTATE <USPTS> HAS GAIN ON SALE
TEXT.BODY: USP Real Estate Investment Trust said it will post a first-quarter gain of 2,258,216 dlrs on the sale of the Spanish Villa Apartments in Savannah, Ga., which was completed last week. Reuter
